# pastaDaGg
### Authentic italian `ggplot2` recepies

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A delicious toy wrapper around `ggplot2` for visualizing longitudinal datasets.

## Installation

You can install the development version of pastaDaGg from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r}
# install.packages("pak")
# pak::pak("SereDef/pastaDaGg")
# or 
devtools::install_github("SereDef/pastaDaGg")
```

## Examples

### Spaghetti
```{r spaghetti, fig.width=7, fig.height=4.5}
library(pastaDaGg)

spaghetti(anthropometry, y = "head_circumference", id = "id", color_by = "sex", split_by = "nationality")
```
